title: Presentation in the Temple
description: Presentation in the Temple. Garments in brown, deep blue, turquoise and green, all flecked with gold. Architectural background blue, purple, and gold.  Green hills, blue sky.  Curtains green and gold.  Blue dais, blue and gold tiled floor.  White altar.
creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
